column3: The lizards claim they will soon bring us before Ifrit for tempering. You're not seriously considering locking horns with the devil now, are you?
Inquire about entry into the Bowl of Embers.
They say no one who enters the Bowl of Embers leaves with their minds intact. Why do you think you will fare any better?

To enter the Bowl of Embers, you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 20 or higher. All members must also have made sufficient progress in the quest “Lord of the Inferno.”
All forays into the Bowl of Embers are limited to 60 minutes (Earth time).
Members level 23 and higher will be synced to level 22 upon entry.
All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area. Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
You were unable to enter <Sheet(InstanceContent,IntegerParameter(2),3)/>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
The lizards claim they will soon bring us before Ifrit for tempering. All of us are as good as dead...
To enter the Bowl of Embers, you must have made sufficient progress in the quest “Lord of the Inferno.”
